sentences.sContent: But while there are certainly aboveboard agents and applications, other recruiters engage in fraudulent behavior.
sentences.sContent_eng: But while there are certainly aboveboard agents and applications, other recruiters engage in fraudulent behavior.
sentences.sCn: 但有一些光明正大的代理机构和申请的同时，另一些招生者从事欺诈行为。

sentences.sContent: It guarantees a fair and aboveboard election by letting every voter express his or her will freely without subject to coercion, surveillance or threat by anyone.
sentences.sContent_eng: It guarantees a fair and aboveboard election by letting every voter express his or her will freely without subject to coercion, surveillance or threat by anyone.
sentences.sCn: 它通过让每位选民自由表达自己的选举意志，并且没有任何人可以对选民进行胁迫、监视以及威胁，来保证选举是公平、光明正大的。

sentences.sContent: You can rebuild trust, but only if your husband behaves in a manner that is completely aboveboard.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can rebuild trust, but only if your husband behaves in a manner that is completely aboveboard.
sentences.sCn: 只要你的丈夫的行为方式完全光明正大，你们完全可以重新建立信任。
他的商业交易是光明正大的。

sentences.sContent: If there was one thing she prided herself on, it was being open and aboveboard.
sentences.sCn: 如果她对自己有一事而自豪，那就是她的公开及光明正大。

trans.tranOther: An arrangement or deal that is aboveboard is legal and is being carried out openly and honestly. A person who is aboveboard is open and honest about what they are doing.
